articles.author: Emily Stedman
articles.title: Wham's Andrew Ridgeley opens up about relationship with George Michael after the band ended - Digital Spy
articles.description: The musician pays tribute to his late friend and their Wham! legacy.
articles.content: Wham! star Andrew Ridgeley has opened up about his relationship with George Michael after the band ended in 1986.Ridgeley and Michael achieved worldwide success and stardom as pop duo Wham! in the 19… [+1909 chars]
